mapper.insert: insert into t_product ( product_id, product_name, product_category, product_price, product_num, product_imgurl, product_description ) values ( #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productCategory}, #{productPrice}, #{productNum}, #{productImgurl}, #{productDescription} )
mapper.update: update t_product set product_name=#{productName}, product_price=#{productPrice}, product_num=#{productNum}, product_category=#{productCategory}, product_imgurl=#{productImgurl}, product_description=#{productDescription} where product_id=#{productId}
